level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall limit the right of an individual to donate, sell, or otherwise recycle his or her materials.
After materials are placed out for collection by a recycling hauler, the materials shall not be removed by anyone other than the hauler.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 7470, 7479 (October 2, 1992); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 11962, 11965 (December 17, 2010).
